name: Nur
about: the PI of the lab, carries scientific curiosity, friend of cats

name: Alireza
about: Next Position: PhD Student at TU Delft, Netherlands

name: Nilufer
about: Next Position: Project and Quality Assurance Specialist at İlko Pharmaceuticals and parttime postdoctoral fellow at Mustafaoglu Lab at Sabanci University

name: Eda
about: Next Position: Senior Site Activation Coordinator at IQVIA

name: Ceren
about: Next Position: Clinical Trial Assistant & Application Specialist at Pfizer

name: Gulin
about: is graduate student in BIO program at SU, having a BSc from Yeditepe University and MSc from Acibadem University. Her interest is understanding of neurodegenerative and neuropsychiatric diseases by creating disease models, and using pharmacogenomic approches to find novel treatment methods. She is crazy about theater and movies.

name: Yomna
about: aims to understand the brain and its disease forms in order to offer novel therapeutic solutions for them. She has worked as a TA in Biochemistry at Mansoura University, Egypt since 2018. She has previously worked as a Pharmacist after graduation. She has graduated from the Faculty of Pharmacy, Mansoura University, Egypt with a BSc in Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2017

name: Efe
about: Next Position: MSc Student in FOKUS Life Sciences program at the University of Würzburg, Germany

name: Melis
about: Next Position: MSc Student in Biochemistry at the University of Würzburg, Germany

name: Fereshteh
about: Next Position: PhD Student at Tarbiat Modares University, Iran

name: Ceren
about: Next Position: MSc Student at Wageningen University, Netherlands

name: Ozan
about: is an undergraduate student in SU. He is interested in the blood-brain barrier, mainly in in vitro assesment of the barrier components and stem cell research.

name: Gulnaz
about: Next Position: Postdoc at Czech Academy of Sciences, Institute of Physiology, Laboratory of Adipose Tissue Biology, Czech Republic

name: Irem
about: received her Ph.D. in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology from Acibadem Mehmet Ali Aydinlar University. Now, joined the Mustafaoğlu lab to investigate how biomechanical forces affect the BBB model from a proteomics point of view.

name: Gulsah
about: Gülşah Sevimli accomplished her BA from Istanbul Bilgi University in 2019 and her MSc at SU in 2022. Now, she joined Mustafaoglu Lab to continue her research as a PhD student in the BIO program.

name: Zeynep
about: Next Position: PhD Student at Penn State University, Biomedical Engineering, USA

name: Sahar
about: is a postdoctoral researcher funded by Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions. Her research interests are in biocompatible and green advance nanomaterials and their surface engineering for diseases treatment and tumor-targeted stimuli-responsive drug delivery systems.

name: Nafisa
about: is a PhD student in the BIO program at SU. She completed her bachelor’s degree in Pharmacy and master’s degree in Clinical Pharmacy and Molecular Pharmacology from East West University, Dhaka, Bangladesh.

name: Gizem
about: Next Position: Research Analyst at New Jersey Institute of Technology

name: Sumeyra Nuran
about: is completed her bachelor's degree in molecular biology & genetics at METU. She is curious about brain diseases, blood-brain barrier, and organ-on-a-chip models. She loves animals and playing theatre.

name: Ahmet Baki
about: is a master's student in the BIO program at SU and received his bachelor's degree from the KFAU. His research interests are neurobiology and drug delivery.

name: Nima
about: an M.Sc. student in the MAT program at SU, holds a B.Sc. in Chemical Engineering with a research background focusing on adsorptive water treatment. He has joined the Mustafaoglu lab to contribute to the development of lignin-based biocomposite surgical patches.

name: Yesim
about: a master's student in the BIO program at SU and received her Bachelor's degree from Gebze Technical University. Her research interests are 3D bioprinting and neurobiology.

name: Aysenur Berra
about: a MSc student in the BIO program at SU. She received her BSc in Molecular Biology and Genetics from KFAU. Her research interests are neurobiology, and 3D bioprinting.

name: Ceylan
about: is passionate about micro-physiologic systems, and neuroscience. Her BSc. (on Neurodegeneration) & MSc. (on 3D BBB chips) from IZTECH BIO. She is a constantly thinking science and art enthusiast. She loves nature and creativity inextinguishably.

name: Busra
about: is a PhD student in the BIO program at SU. She received her BSc and MSc in Molecular Biology and Genetics at Yıldız Technical University. She is interested in modeling cancer metastasis using microfluidic systems. She enjoys horse riding.

name: Emir
about: an undergraduate Molecular Biology, Genetics and Bioengineering student at SU. Emir is interested in neurodegeneretive diseases and drug delivery systems.

name: Gokdeniz
about: a Master's student in the BIO program at SU. She received her BSc from Bilkent University. Her research interests include neuroscience and bioengineering. In her free time, she loves playing with her cat and reading fantasy-romance books

name: Zeynep Nur
about: is a master's student in BIO program at SU. She completed her BSc at Bogazici University in Molecular Biology and Genetics. Her research interests are drug delivery and neurobiology.

name: Ihsan
about: is a master’s student in the BIO program at SU. He completed his BSc in Molecular Biology and Genetics at Middle East Technical University (METU). His research interests include neurobiology and drug delivery systems.

name: Gulten
about: completed her BSc in MBG at Boğaziçi University. Her research interests are neurobiology and stem cell research

name: Shoeb
about: is a researcher in the fields of nanomedicine, drug delivery, and neurodegenerative disorders. He received his Ph.D. in Complex Systems of Life Sciences from the University of Turin, Italy.

name: Zulal
about: is a PhD student in the BIO program at SU. She is interested in designing novel gut-on-a-chip platforms to utilize them in organ/disease modeling. She loves planting and hiking.
